title: I'm Leaving YouTube
author: Yes Theory
description:
ğŸ“ Follow Mattâ€™s Newsletter: http://yestheory.com/newsletter/

After five and a half years as a host on this channel, I've decided to step away. 'Thank You' are the only two words I can muster. You, this community, have shown me nothing but endless love and support. The video goes into detail about my decision.

I'll be writing a short newsletter twice a month at www.yestheory.com/newsletter. This is the newsletter I wish my 19 year old self had when I first set out to live a fulfilling life. When you sign you'll receive lessons, tips and tricks from ten years of seeking discomfort.

I'll also be working on the book which will come out in November of this year...but more on that later.

Come follow along on the ride. We're only just getting started :)

Also, make sure to wait till the end to watch our EPIC season trailer. 

Love you all,

Matt

ğŸ¬  Mattâ€™s Best Moments: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3yw6EPr6jJM

ğŸ™ğŸ¼ Thank you for making these videos possible through your support of Seek Discomfort 
âš¡ï¸ SEEK DISCOMFORT: http://seek-discomfort.com/yes-theory

JOIN OUR COMMUNITY
âº Yes Theory Plus: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCTd7KzdwnFE3lm6LCfYDmUQ
ğŸ“¸ Instagram -  https://www.instagram.com/yestheory/
ğŸ¦ Twitter - https://twitter.com/yestheory
ğŸ¬  Facebook- https://www.facebook.com/yestheory/

If you want to join the Yes Fam Facebook group which is 100,000+ of our most engaged and badass community members, you can apply here: 
https://www.facebook.com/groups/yesfam/

ğŸ¥ HOW WE MAKE OUR VIDEOS

ğŸµ Where we find our music:
1- Epidemic Sound. Amazing royalty free music for YouTube. Free 30 day trial here: http://share.epidemicsound.com/wFFbrâ€‹ 

2- Musicbed. Amazing label-quality cinematic music. 30-day free trial here:
http://share.mscbd.fm/YesTheoryâ€‹

3- Artlist. 2 Months Free High Quality Music: https://artlist.io/artlist-70446/?artâ€‹...

ğŸ Our b-roll and stock footage:

2 Months Free Stock Footage Videos: https://artgrid.io/Artgrid-114820?artâ€‹...

For an amazing b-roll and footage library, checkout: http://storyblocks.com/YesTheoryâ€‹

ğŸ“ˆ  Our Most Popular YouTube Videos

ğŸ¬  Becoming Superhuman with Iceman Wim Hof: https://youtu.be/8cvhwquPqJ0
ğŸ¬  We Helicopter Bungee Jumped with Will Smith: https://youtu.be/KSu6gRp7UBA

ğŸ™ The Yes Theory Podcast: https://spoti.fi/3sFdq6v

GET IN TOUCH
ğŸŒ Our website - www.yestheory.com 
ğŸŒ Advertise With Us - zack@onedayent.com 
 
Who are we? 
We believe that lifeâ€™s greatest moments and deepest connections exist outside of your comfort zone.

Ask us a Question:
Tweet us @yestheory
